name: live-blog
tagline: A real time blogging platform for live news coverage
description: Liveblog is a real-time blogging and news commentary platform used by newsrooms. It supports live updates, media embedding, and collaborative editing with a responsive web dashboard for event coverage.

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Live updates, Event coverage, Breaking news. Blog events as they happen

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multi-user, Team workflows, Role management. Newsroom-ready platform

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Images and videos, Social media, Rich content. Engaging live coverage

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Mobile-friendly, Fast updates, Clean interface. Reach audiences on any device
